entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
